definition: see 恆星系|恒星系[heng2 xing1 xi4]
extragalactic star system/galaxy (not including our Galaxy)

sentences.english: Usually, galaxies this topsy-turvy result from a recent collision with a neighboring galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 通常星系這種亂七八糟是最近與鄰近星系碰撞的結果。

sentences.english: Usually, galaxies this topsy-turvy result from a recent collision with a neighboring galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 通常星系這種亂七八糟是最近與鄰近星系碰撞的結果。

sentences.english: How did the second AGN remain hidden for so long?
sentences.chinese: 第二個活動星系核是如何保持隱藏了這麼久？

sentences.english: An intense ring of stars forms at the outer edges of the new, combined galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 激烈的環星形式在外層空間邊緣，新合併的星系。

sentences.english: A constellation in the Northern Hemisphere near Andromeda and Auriga.
sentences.chinese: 我們的星系刻正移向與仙女座星系碰撞之途。

sentences.english: A constellation in the Northern Hemisphere near Andromeda and Auriga.
sentences.chinese: 我們的星系刻正移向與仙女座星系碰撞之途。

sentences.english: Using diffirent methods, the quasar-galaxy associations are tested.
sentences.chinese: 本文進行了類星體和星系的成協性分析。

sentences.english: Tegmark is an expert in analyzing the cosmic microwave background and galaxy clustering.
sentences.chinese: 鐵馬克是分析宇宙微波背景輻射與星系團的專家。

sentences.english: Within it, the Wall contains several interesting superclusters.
sentences.chinese: 在其內部，這條“長城”包含幾個有趣的超星系團。

sentences.english: “We don’t observe more mergers in the AGN host galaxies,” Cisternas said.
sentences.chinese: 我們沒有觀測更多AGN母星系的吞併。

sentences.english: One of the easiest ways to compare galaxies is to compare their magnitudes .
sentences.chinese: 比較星系的最簡單方法之一是比較它們的星等。

sentences.english: Typical superclusters have many smaller clusters connected by these threads.
sentences.chinese: 典型的超星系團本應該含有成串的小星系團。

sentences.english: Typical superclusters have many smaller clusters connected by these threads.
sentences.chinese: 典型的超星系團本應該含有成串的小星系團。

sentences.english: An artist's depiction of flying into this system is shown in the above video.
sentences.chinese: 上面的視頻是一位藝術家描繪的飛入該星系的畫面。

sentences.english: It is the brightest starburst galaxy ever spotted in the distant universe.
sentences.chinese: 該星系是在宇宙深處所發現的最爲明亮的星暴星系。

sentences.english: It is the brightest starburst galaxy ever spotted in the distant universe.
sentences.chinese: 該星系是在宇宙深處所發現的最爲明亮的星暴星系。

definition: celestial body (e.g. planet, satellite etc)/heavenly body
asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter
Orion spiral arm or local spur of our galaxy (containing our solar system)
